splash.heading: Are you struggling with your insurance claim?
splash.description: Whether you’ve filed a claim or not, GuardianClaims is here to help. With our simple intake process, getting started is easy. Just fill out the form, and we will review your file to make sure you are a good fit for a Public Adjuster. From start to finish, we keep you informed and updated every step of the way.
splash.footerText: Let GuardianClaims be your protector and defender against unjust insurance practices. We're here to shield your claim and fight for your right to fair compensation.

claimSteps.headingThinTwo: , we are here to help you navigate through the complicated and confusing insurance claims process.
claimSteps.description: Our services cover a wide range of losses, including hail/wind damage, water damage, fire damage, mold damage, loss of income, and more. We offer a FREE consultation to assess the extent of the damage and determine the best course of action.

boxes.title: Submit Our Intake Form
boxes.description: Click the button below to fill out our short Claims form. Every claim is different, this will allow us to better understand your specific situation.

boxes.title: Connect with Our Team
boxes.description: A licensed public adjuster in your state will review your information and reach out for a free claim review. Not every claim is a good fit for a public adjuster, and in order to best serve our clients, we believe education and communication are key!

boxes.title: Receive Settlement
boxes.description: After our adjusters complete their investigation of your claim, and finalize negotiations with your insurance company, you’ll receive a check in the mail!

claimTypes.headingBold: We process all types of claims daily.
claimTypes.description: Residential and commercial losses, emergency services, and planned restoration projects.

residentialSplash.heading: Residential
residentialSplash.paragraph: With our simple intake process, getting started is easy. Just fill out the form, and we will review your file to make sure you are a good fit for a Public Adjuster. From start to finish, we keep you informed and updated every step of the way.

contentOne.heading: Our Residential Property Process
contentOne.paragraphOne: After your file is reviewed by a licensed public adjuster, a GuardianClaims team member will reach out to schedule an inspection of the damages.
contentOne.paragraphTwo: Our adjusters are trained in residential property inspections and have completed over 1000 inspections combined to-date. The first step to properly assessing any loss is a detailed and accurate inspection. Once our team completes their claim investigation, and compiles all relevant documents, estimates, and invoices, we can confidently present your claim to your insurance company and begin negotiations.

contentTwo.heading: Claim Presentation & Negotiation
contentTwo.paragraphOne: The negotiation phase is oftentimes the most frustrating part of the entire claim process, and if not handled correctly, can drag out for months and months. Even years. This is where most homeowners/policyholders make the mistake of trusting that the assessment they receive from their insurance adjuster was written with their best interests in mind.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: It’s important to have a knowledgeable and experienced advocate present your claim in the full context of your policy, to ensure you’re recouping every dime that you’re owed after a loss.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: We’ve finally arrived at the settlement phase! The most anticipated part of any insurance claim. In many cases, the insurance company will attempt to settle your claim immediately after their initial inspection with little thought being put into what it is they’re actually paying for (if anything).
contentThree.paragraphTwo: However, allowing GuardianClaims to guide you through our systematic claim process guarantees a fair and accurate settlement based upon the coverage provided in your policy, and the damages sustained to your property.

commercialSplash.heading: Commercial
commercialSplash.paragraph: At GuardianClaims we understand the busy daily life of business owners. Our streamlined claim process was created to make sure that the headaches of dealing with your insurance company are handled by an expert. Our team is trained to get you the best settlement possible, without having to waste your valuable time.

contentOne.heading: Our Commercial Property Process
contentOne.paragraphOne: After your file is reviewed by a licensed public adjuster, a GuardianClaims team member will reach out to schedule an inspection of the damages. Our initial process includes a detailed and thorough hands on inspection complete with a full photo loss report. You can rest easy knowing that GuardianClaims will account for every dollar of your loss!

contentTwo.heading: Claim Presentation & Negotiation
contentTwo.paragraphOne: Once our initial inspection and photo loss report is compiled, we will then write a comprehensive scope to account for all damages related to your loss. Our comprehensive scope aims to capture both the obvious and hidden or underlying damages, ensuring that nothing is overlooked. By considering all the associated losses, our scope ensures that the restoration efforts are thorough and complete.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: This scope document may include itemized lists of damaged property, recommended repairs or replacements, estimated costs, and any additional measures required to mitigate further losses. It serves as a roadmap for the subsequent restoration or recovery efforts, which will help guide your insurance company to a quick and easy resolution.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: We have now reached the settlement phase, which is often the most eagerly awaited part of an insurance claim. Unfortunately, in many cases, insurance companies may try to settle the claim hastily after their initial inspection, without thoroughly considering what they are actually paying for, if anything.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: By relying on our expertise and systematic approach, you can have confidence in the fairness and accuracy of the settlement. We take into account all the relevant factors, such as the extent of damages and the coverage specified in your policy, to negotiate a settlement that adequately compensates you for your losses.

contractorSplash.paragraph: Calling all contractors and restoration professionals! Interested in becoming a part of the GuardianClaims Network?

whoWeAre.heading: Who We Are
paragraphs: Founded by Josh Dalli and Phil Mascolo, Guardian Claims is a public adjusting firm based in Charlotte, NC serving North Carolina and South Carolina. With over 8 years of combined industry experience, we have witnessed the frustrations and disappointments that can come with filing an insurance claim.

As licensed public adjusters, we have a deep understanding of the complex claims process, and have seen firsthand the tactics that insurance companies use to minimize payouts and deny claims. We know how to navigate these obstacles to ensure that our clients receive the compensation they deserve.

At Guardian Claims, communication is key to a successful claims process. Our firm prioritizes transparency and open dialogue with clients from start to finish. We work closely with clients to understand the unique circumstances of their claim, and keep them informed every step of the way.

Our team at Guardian Claims is committed to providing exceptional service, going above and beyond for clients. We understand that filing a claim can be a stressful and overwhelming experience, which is why we strive to make the process as easy and stress-free as possible. Whether dealing with property damage, a natural disaster, or any other type of insurance claim, clients can trust Guardian Claims to be their advocate and fight for their rights.
Thank you for considering Guardian Claims for your public adjusting needs. We look forward to working with you!
